__e: This shitty university is full of people that don't care about me.

The druggiskell who blames her mother for her mistakes or the woman with brains and--and spirit, the woman who scored a-a scholarship to the best med school in the state, the woman I know can find her way through this.
Well, I'm glad I didn't spend four years at your crap university.
Our university is as safe as ever. Our security staff of the highest caliber.
He cleaned out your college fund and you weren't mad at him?
I don't go to college here,
She said I'm not sufficiently well-rounded enough for today's top universities.
If there was a poison college, I certainly don't know where it is.
You're kidding. What I need is your advice on how to tell Michelle that she has the option of going to one of the best universities in the world.
You could go to any program in the country and you'd find violations, but, no, year after year you come after me.
Meanwhile, we have a fresh murder to consider, and the victim's college roommate just walked through the door.
No, no, he didn't tell me, he asked me how I felt about it because he assumed I knew, like I know about all the East Coast schools that you applied to.
